long_description: Use this tough nylon footprint under your Sierra Designs Flash 3 or Flash 3 UL tent to protect the floor from abrasion and wear. Sizing specific to the tent prevents water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: Use this tough nylon footprint under your Sierra Designs Flash 3 or Flash 3 UL tent to protect the floor from abrasion and wear.
